DOC.brief_summary: The Study compare group base care versus individual give care-effects patient satisfaction health . Midwives randomize either traditional antenatal care ( Individual care ) group base antenatal care ( intervention ) .
DOC.brief_title: Group Based Care Versus Individual Care
DOC.detailed_description: In RCT midwife randomized.There multicenter study . Before study start midwife receive education study . Then randomize simple randomization per site ( clinic ) . The midwife also follow meet research team recruting period . The parent inform study book appointment , choose want participate study allocate either intervention control , base woman 's date birth . The main aim investigate parent ' satisfaction antenatal group base care . The RCT base three questionnaire woman partner receive , first baseline receive different model care , second questionnaire distribute four six month birth last one year birth . Descriptive inferential statistic use analysis.A power calculation make study schould total number 350 partner .
